page.title: 17ROADS.
page.content: The{roads}in our area are very{busy with{traffic.} The{lollipop lady}does her best, but people who are driving don't always take notice. There aren't enough{signs}near the roads, and car drivers go very{fast}on the main roads. The roads are flat in some places and hilly in others. They are very old and are the cause of many{accidents, some very serious. There have been a lot of accidents in our area, like breaking legs, and one boy is now in a wheelchair for the rest of his life. The{condition}of the roads seems very bad to me. There are lots of brake marks, which mean people drive too fast. There is a main road close to our school and some children from our school have been in accidents.
